animeTitle: Sacred Seven: Shirogane no Tsubasa Picture Drama Special
otherNames: Sacred Seven: Wings of the Silver Moon Picture Drama, 劇場版 セイクリッドセブン – 銀月の翼 – ピクチャードラマ
synopsis: Picture Drama included in Sacred Seven: Shirogane no Tsubasa, where Knight and Fei are in the same school as Alma and others.
